translations.translation: If you do not have iman in me, then at least leave me alone.'
If you do not believe in me, leave me alone."
But if you do not believe what I say, leave me alone (and desist from laying hands on me).”
If you do not want to believe, leave me alone".
“And if you do not believe in me, then have no relation with me.”
But if you believe me not, then keep away from me and leave me alone."
And if you do not believe in me, then leave me alone.
But if so be that you believe me not, go you apart from me!'
And if ye put no faith in me, then let me go.
If you do not believe in me, at least keep away from me."
And if ye will not believe in me, then let me alone.
And if you do not believe me, keep out of my way.’
If ye believe me not, at least keep yourselves away from me."
But if you believe me not, then keep away from me and leave me alone."
And if you do not believe me, then leave me'
But if you do not believe in me, keep away from me.”
But if you do not believe me, then leave me alone."
[44:21] And if you do not believe me, then stay away from me’, [that is] then refrain from harming me — but they did not refrain from such [action].
(And if ye put no faith in me) and if you do not believe in the message I bring you, (then let me go) then leave me alone, neither harmed by you nor benefiting from you.
